channel.title: Horizon | 718 | Loading 839 || Vorago - 5 Phases + Rotations & Voke Shields
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B]Introduction
Hey MoparScape![/B] Thank you for taking your time to check out the thread!
We are proudly introducing a 718 with Full 5 Phases of Vorago & Provoke Shields with all rotations just like RS3. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZFrSGS1knSY Big shoutout to Armar & Marcus as without them we would not have this on the 718 server.
[URL=http://"http://horizon-rsps.com/"] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5878467/Forums.png[/img] [/URL]
[URL=http://"http://horizon-rsps.com/index.php?/topic/17-horizon-goes-public/"] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5878466/Play_Now.png[/img] [/URL]
Before we begin we would like to give our thanks and credits to [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/hc747/"]hc747[/URL] as without him or the Hyperion II base this would not be possible.
Back in March [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/vocals/"]Marcus[/URL] and [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/horizon_junes"]Junes[/URL] began playing on a server that grew into a nice community, during this time we met some great people along the way, unfortuantely this died as quick as it came into the public domain.
As a result of this we decided to take it upon ourselves to try and bring this community back together, we got in touch with hc747 to make sure he was happy for us to continue the project that started off as his. Since picking this up we have made many tweaks and changes to make it more stable and we have been in touch with Cjay0091 who is helping us with client-sided work.
Please visit and register on our forums to introduce yourself www.horizon-rsps.com
[B]Horizon General Ingame Features
-25 Trainable Skills
- Regular and ultimate ironman modes.
- XP modes: Easy = 50*RS | Hard = 25*RS | Insane = 5*RS.
- Daily tasks that scale to your levels with rewards and provide huge variety.
- Clan chat system, with customisation, guest chats, logos, etc.
- Clean Grand Exchange with no search lag, prices changing etc.
- Squeal of Fortune.
- 80+ pets obtainable (All boss pets).
- Achievement rewards, Real RS3 master capes, max cape, completionist and trimmed completionist capes with the ability to create hooded max/comp/trim capes!
- Challenging and rewarding bosses.
- Tier 90 gear: malevolent, drygores, sirenic, ascensions, tectonic, seismic, ROtS shields, noxious longbow & Provoke Shields.
- Dual wielding with CLEAN sheathing (no command - done via appearance data): low level magic wands, Ahrim's, Virtus, dragon, chaotics, ascensions, drygores, seismics.
- Dragon keepsake keys and cosmetic keepsaking (weapons and shields are disabled automatically in combat, all are disabled in pvp).
- Gear presets, similar to RS3.
- Achievement trackers for bosses, clue scrolls and barrows.
- Charming imp and boss pets system.
- Trivia system, maximum five answers per question and point shop with rewards.
- Five tier prestige system, with tier 85 ports armours available in fifth prestige shop.
- Post Eoc gear, including batwing, spider silk, imphide, obsidian, tetsu, sea singer and death lotus.
- Barrows dye, Third-age dye and Shadow dye available in clue scrolls to recolour all tier-90 weapons,
- Custom, toggle-able combat animations to create a more immersive melee combat experience.
[/B] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ihbFJ/3c7b094f41.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G6IgBPd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/0f0592525582a6d86247fb1367440619.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1dDE/ad7b2546e9.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [B] Minigames - Pest Control - Soul Wars - Hunger games - Castle Wars - Undead Nightmare - Duel Arena - Dominion Tower - Fight Caves - Fight Kiln (with melee/ranged/mage kiln capes) - Fight Pits - Barrows - Puro Puro - Runespan [/B] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pzbu15d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/67WbXiU.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fi5wdbU.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BvO1zCg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p22AYVW.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/jQrzG/9bb7b02e5f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8bhwhJc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hNmp4xx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zQmoluW.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jU40ffI.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o9NWaS6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oi9roC4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ifGEK/02f7157ab3.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER] [B]PVM Content - Vorago. - Kalphite King. - Araxxor. - God Wars Dungeon (all requirements including Nex access with frozen key) - Seperate, instances God Wars bosses. - Wildywyrm that spawns in random locations in the wilderness. - King Black Dragon - Kalphite Queen - Queen Black Dragon - Chaos elemental - Corporeal Beast - Dagannoth Kings - Glacors. - Regular, co-op and boss slayer with points and shop, task length changing and slayer helm crafting etc. - PvM points with rewards that benefit your PvM experience. - Dwarf multicannon with cannonball smithing. [/B] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IPmk9tU.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b9lEa5C.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1202/2e51b75b96.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9o0ltEN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yNU6rrU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EsbrkVo.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/hYASB/5fba224d39.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i0hk7/d55178b79d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OSRWrYd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/bXz3F/1db5a3c405.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i0gJr/ccf1b78758.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GcTEybq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i0fOc/9eddd23066.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i0jtL/9cd3ae68d4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bCuA50P.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hulWMHr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xeL0vUV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i0fyq/f46ca3b107.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i13uc/b0330d6574.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER] [B]Skilling Content - Milestones globally announced, 120 capes (with exp requirement), customisable and interactable adventurer's log to display what each player chooses - Lava flow mine, red sandstone and gem rocks - Full crafting (pottery crafting, urns, jewelry, glass blowing / flask making, leather crafting, spinning) - Proper construction (all builds creatable, all items / objects interactable (work in progress), house visiting, and distractions and diversions within the players home) - Proper herblore (all items processed automatically, overloads able to made in one process, proper potion effects) - All skills able to be trained in a diverse range of ways without any duplication or process errors. - Prifddinas skilling content, such as Seren stones, Hefin agility course, crystal-flicked sandstone and flask creation. [/B]
[B]Credits: [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/hc747/"]Hc747[/URL] - For Hyperion & Hyperion II [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/cjay0091/"]CJay0091[/URL] - For 718/839 Client & Cache [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/substance/"]Substance[/URL] - Web Services [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/oxygene/"]Oxygene[/URL] - Web Services [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/elon+musk/"]Elon[/URL] - Web Services [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/awaitingvalhalla/"]Awaitingvalhalla[/URL] - PkBots [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/armar+x+k1ng/"]Armar X King[/URL] - RS3 Vorago + Conversion to 718 [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/vocals/"]Marcus[/URL] - Vorago Conversion to 718 plus other continuous content deployment [URL=http://"https://www.rune-server.org/members/horizon_junes/"]Junes[/URL]
[/B] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I3F6d8A.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1gD7/8134eb2d42.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1hTY/f271fe24b4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1i5l/b61f5e60e6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1gQi/0952dd9057.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1gXB/8dc7fa86e2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1hEb/0fd8c4cb7e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1hb6/1982f38149.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/i1hlS/e0993e704f.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
[spoiler=More Media] [SIZE=4]Dual Wielding[/SIZE] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ddfebc05fe38d0d18234396153b12c78.gif[/img]
[SIZE=4]Weapon/Shield Sheething[/SIZE] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/6893cf9475117d16d07a3a58799c3522.gif[/img]
[SIZE=4]Comp Cape[/SIZE] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/e6d422aeb466a0bfb2c5c28d02893729.gif[/img]
[SIZE=4]Mini-Games[/SIZE] Domination Tower: [IMG]http://image.prntscr.com/image/48e6c34b79a847d4b45b3fab06ed2580.png[/img] [IMG]http://image.prntscr.com/image/1f41403b6e0c467b9ed67ed0fe0bc98c.png[/img]

item.title: Horizon | 718 | Loading 839 || Vorago - 5 Phases + Rotations & Voke Shields
item.dc:creator: @Horizon_Junes Horizon_Junes
item.description:
@Horizon_Junes wrote:

[CENTER]
[B]Introduction

Hey MoparScape![/B]
Thank you for taking your time to check out the thread!

We are proudly introducing a 718 with Full 5 Phases of Vorago & Provoke Shields with all rotations just like RS3.


Big shoutout to Armar & Marcus as without them we would not have this on the 718 server.





Before we begin we would like to give our thanks and credits to hc747 as without him or the Hyperion II base this would not be possible.

Back in March Marcus and Junes began playing on a server that grew into a nice community, during this time we met some great people along the way, unfortuantely this died as quick as it came into the public domain.

As a result of this we decided to take it upon ourselves to try and bring this community back together, we got in touch with hc747 to make sure he was happy for us to continue the project that started off as his. Since picking this up we have made many tweaks and changes to make it more stable and we have been in touch with Cjay0091 who is helping us with client-sided work.

Please visit and register on our forums to introduce yourself
www.horizon-rsps.com

[B]Horizon General Ingame Features

-25 Trainable Skills

  • Regular and ultimate ironman modes.

  • XP modes: Easy = 50RS | Hard = 25RS | Insane = 5*RS.

  • Daily tasks that scale to your levels with rewards and provide huge variety.

  • Clan chat system, with customisation, guest chats, logos, etc.

  • Clean Grand Exchange with no search lag, prices changing etc.

  • Squeal of Fortune.

  • 80+ pets obtainable (All boss pets).

  • Achievement rewards, Real RS3 master capes, max cape, completionist and trimmed completionist capes with the ability to create hooded max/comp/trim capes!

  • Challenging and rewarding bosses.

  • Tier 90 gear: malevolent, drygores, sirenic, ascensions, tectonic, seismic, ROtS shields, noxious longbow & Provoke Shields.

  • Dual wielding with CLEAN sheathing (no command - done via appearance data): low level magic wands, Ahrim’s, Virtus, dragon, chaotics, ascensions, drygores, seismics.

  • Dragon keepsake keys and cosmetic keepsaking (weapons and shields are disabled automatically in combat, all are disabled in pvp).

  • Gear presets, similar to RS3.

  • Achievement trackers for bosses, clue scrolls and barrows.

  • Charming imp and boss pets system.

  • Trivia system, maximum five answers per question and point shop with rewards.

  • Five tier prestige system, with tier 85 ports armours available in fifth prestige shop.

  • Post Eoc gear, including batwing, spider silk, imphide, obsidian, tetsu, sea singer and death lotus.

  • Barrows dye, Third-age dye and Shadow dye available in clue scrolls to recolour all tier-90 weapons,

  • Custom, toggle-able combat animations to create a more immersive melee combat experience.

[/B]
[SPOILER=Media]

3c7b094f41.jpg1309×382

G6IgBPd.jpg811×592



[/SPOILER]
[B] Minigames

  • Pest Control
  • Soul Wars
  • Hunger games
  • Castle Wars
  • Undead Nightmare
  • Duel Arena
  • Dominion Tower
  • Fight Caves
  • Fight Kiln (with melee/ranged/mage kiln capes)
  • Fight Pits
  • Barrows
  • Puro Puro
  • Runespan
    [/B]
    [SPOILER=Media]
    pzbu15d.jpg3439×1418

    67WbXiU.jpg3439×1421

    fi5wdbU.jpg3439×1418

    BvO1zCg.jpg3439×1382

    p22AYVW.jpg3439×1415

    9bb7b02e5f.jpg1649×949

    8bhwhJc.jpg3439×1421

    hNmp4xx.jpg3439×1421

    zQmoluW.jpg3439×1415

    jU40ffI.jpg3439×1421

    o9NWaS6.jpg3439×1421

    oi9roC4.jpg3439×1421

    02f7157ab3.jpg1919×999

    [/SPOILER]
    [B]PVM Content
  • Vorago.
  • Kalphite King.
  • Araxxor.
  • God Wars Dungeon (all requirements including Nex access with frozen key)
  • Seperate, instances God Wars bosses.
  • Wildywyrm that spawns in random locations in the wilderness.
  • King Black Dragon
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Chaos elemental
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Glacors.
  • Regular, co-op and boss slayer with points and shop, task length changing and slayer helm crafting etc.
  • PvM points with rewards that benefit your PvM experience.
  • Dwarf multicannon with cannonball smithing.
    [/B]
    [SPOILER=Media]
    IPmk9tU.jpg645×518

    b9lEa5C.jpg1588×765

    2e51b75b96.jpg1916×751

    9o0ltEN.jpg852×489



    5fba224d39.jpg1471×880

    d55178b79d.jpg1234×592

    f46ca3b107.jpg709×850

    b0330d6574.jpg1432×750

    [/SPOILER]
    [B]Skilling Content
  • Milestones globally announced, 120 capes (with exp requirement), customisable and interactable adventurer’s log to display what each player chooses
  • Lava flow mine, red sandstone and gem rocks
  • Full crafting (pottery crafting, urns, jewelry, glass blowing / flask making, leather crafting, spinning)
  • Proper construction (all builds creatable, all items / objects interactable (work in progress), house visiting, and distractions and diversions within the players home)
  • Proper herblore (all items processed automatically, overloads able to made in one process, proper potion effects)
  • All skills able to be trained in a diverse range of ways without any duplication or process errors.
  • Prifddinas skilling content, such as Seren stones, Hefin agility course, crystal-flicked sandstone and flask creation.
    [/B]

[B]Credits:
Hc747 - For Hyperion & Hyperion II
CJay0091 - For 718/839 Client & Cache
Substance - Web Services
Oxygene - Web Services
Elon - Web Services
Awaitingvalhalla - PkBots
Armar X King - RS3 Vorago + Conversion to 718
Marcus - Vorago Conversion to 718 plus other continuous content deployment
Junes

[/B]
